"$input.bygroup" #if $input.groups.__str__ != "None" and len($input.groups.__str__) > 0: --groups="$input.groups" #end if #set results = $results + ["'" + $__app__.datatypes_registry.get_datatype_by_extension('sabund').__class__): --sabund="$input.otu" #set results = $results + ["'" + $re.sub(r'(^.*)\.(.*?)',r'\1.pick.\2',$os.path.basename($input.otu.__str__)) + ":'" + $pick_otu.__str__] #elif isinstance($input.otu.datatype, = $results + ["'" + $re.sub(r'(^.*)\.(.*?)',r'\1.pick.\2',$os.path.basename($input.group.__str__)) + ":'" + $pick_group.__str__] #end if #if $input.groups.__str__ != "None" and len($input.groups.__str__) > 0: --groups="$input.groups" #end if #set results = $results + ["'" + $re.sub(r'(^.*)\.(.*?)',r'\1.pick.\2',$os.path.basename($input.otu.__str__)) + ":'" + "None" and len($count.__str__) > 0: --count="$count" #end if

param.name: bygroup
param.label: bygroup - Remove any OTU that has nseqs or fewer sequences across all groups

param.name: count
param.label: count
param.help: If you clustered with a count file, be sure to include it

param.name: nseqs
param.label: nseqs - Number of sequences cutoff for an otu to be deemed rare

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The remove.rare_ command reads one of the following file types: list_, rabund_, sabund_ or shared_ file. It outputs a new file after removing the rare otus.
.. _list: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/List_file .. _sabund: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Sabund_file .. _rabund: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Rabund_file .. _shared: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Shared_file .. _remove.rare: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Remove.rare
